nodes.text: Mular'Stef was a female Human who served as an officer in the Republic Army. During the Galactic War with the reconstituted Sith Empire, she was stationed at the Galactic Republic's Aurek Base on the planet Hoth.
Mular'Stef appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Social Items Vendor for Republic players on Hoth.
